title: Quizzes
html_content:
The wife wants a night breakfast with her husband; she has an egg; he the milk.

Chris created quizzes for his fans to answer on the long-since-defunct MyBUZZ! website, which allowed users to make their own quizzes to play on the website and download for play in the PlayStation 3 game Buzz!: Quiz TV. Most were uploaded between April and May 2009.

In alphabetical order, Chris created the following quizzes:

  • Autism
  • Autobots, Transform and Roll Out
  • Christian Weston Chandler
  • CWC Random Humor
  • CWC's Dating Education Exam - see dating education for this quiz
  • Decepticons, Rise Up!
  • Gilligan's Island Quiz
  • Guitar Hero Set Set, Bonus, DLC
  • Guitar Hero Song Match 1
  • Guitar Hero Song Match Set 1
  • Guitar Hero South Park
  • Guitar Hero, Name the Rocker
  • LittleBigPlanet Costume Quiz
  • Peanut Gallery
  • Sonic the Hedgehog History
  • Sonic Vs. Sonichu
  • Sonichu Quiz from CWC
  • Sonichu Quiz 2
  • Troll Quiz
  • Who's On First

Due to the website being no longer up and the online servers for Buzz! having been shut down a while ago, Chris's questions have likely been lost to time.

Contents

  • 1 Quizzes
    • 1.1 Christian Weston Chandler Quiz
    • 1.2 Autism Quiz
    • 1.3 Troll Quiz
    • 1.4 Autobots, Transform and Roll Out
    • 1.5 CWC Random Humor
    • 1.6 CWC's Dating Education Exam
    • 1.7 Decepticons, Rise Up!
    • 1.8 Gilligan's Island Quiz
    • 1.9 Guitar Hero Set Set, Bonus, DLC
    • 1.10 Guitar Hero Song Match 1
    • 1.11 Guitar Hero Song Match Set 2
    • 1.12 Guitar Hero South Park
    • 1.13 Guitar Hero, Name the Rocker
    • 1.14 LittleBiGPlanet Costume Quiz
    • 1.15 Peanut Gallery
    • 1.16 Sonic the Hedgehog History
    • 1.17 Sonic Vs. Sonichu
    • 1.18 Sonichu Quiz from CWC
    • 1.19 Sonichu Quiz 2
    • 1.20 Who's On First
  • 2 Sources

Quizzes

Christian Weston Chandler Quiz

Highlight for answers.

1. Before Sonic the Hedgehog, who was his first cartoon hero?

  • American Rabbit ⇠ see User:ChrisChanSonichu profile#His Early Years - Birth to 1992
  • Care Bear, Tenderheart
  • Super Mario
  • Unico (the anime unicorn)

2. Which is his favorite movie of all time?

  • Mary Poppins ⇠ see Mary Poppins
  • On the Town
  • Toy Story
  • Singin' in the Rain

3. He sees himself as a strong, noble leader-type figure like this leader

  • Optimus Prime ⇠ see User:ChrisChanSonichu profile#More Information About Myself
  • Sonic the Hedgehog
  • Powerpuff Girl, Blossom
  • Fox Mccloud

4. Which of these popular stars guest-starred in his dreams of choosing either celebrity or closer girlfriend in real life?

  • Amy jo Johnson
  • Britney Spears
  • Christina Agularia
  • Pamela Anderson ⇠ see Vanessa IRC Chat 2 and IRC (18 December 2008) and IRC (31 December 2008)

5. In a repeated past dream, where did chris find his unknown sweetheart?

  • At a rockin' concert
  • At the high school prom
  • A friend's weeding
  • In a watery maze ⇠ see Dreams#The_watery_maze_dream

6. Chris earned honor roll throughout middle and high schools; which other achievement was he recognized for?

  • Diploma and CADD degree certificate
  • Made the Dean's list
  • Varsity basketball manager
  • All of these ⇠ see CADD and Piedmont Virginia Community College and Joseph Herring

7. Chris was diagnosed in his life for having what?

  • Alzheimers
  • Aspergers
  • Autism ⇠ Answer
  • All of these

8. Chris feels annoyed when others misunderstand him and twists his own words around, what would he appreciate very much?

  • Please do not yell at me
  • Please cease and remove all slanders against me
  • Please respect my feelings and space as a person ⇠ Answer
  • Please let me regain my mind's peace

Autism Quiz

Highlight for answers.

1. Autism is a brain development disorder characterized by...

  • Impared communication
  • Impared social interaction
  • Restricted, repetitive behavior
  • All of these ⇠ Answer

2. People with autism often have trouble understanding what?

  • Nonverbal social cues ⇠ Answer
  • People in general
  • The world
  • All of these

3. Many autistic people show superior skill in what?

  • Drawing
  • Shape-matching
  • Perception and attention ⇠ Answer
  • Computer skills

4. Special education and behavior therapy early in life can help children get...

  • Self-care skills
  • Social skills
  • Job skills
  • All of these ⇠ Answer

5. High-functioning autistic people have what?

  • Less communication skills
  • Less emotional content in speech
  • Less able to interpret non-verbal cues
  • Above-average IQ ⇠ Answer

6. After special education and therapy, what is really good for an HFA person?

  • Mainstreaming ⇠ Answer
  • Isolate
  • Institution
  • Nothing

7. Which of these famous people has had a form of autism?

  • Christian Weston Chandler
  • Janet Frame
  • Artist Michelangelo
  • All of them ⇠ Answer

8. Autism of any form is similar to Asperger's.

  • Yes they are similar
  • No they have nothing in common ⇠ Answer
  • Maybe
  • I don't know

Troll Quiz

Highlight for answers.

1. You know you're a troll if...

  • You're a nerd
  • You're a jock
  • You're so vain
  • You're obsessing over some famous person ⇠ Answer

2. You know you're a troll if...

  • You have pale skin ⇠ Answer
  • You have some sunlight
  • You have a good tan
  • all of these

3. You know you're a troll if your favorite thing is...

  • Your game boy
  • The internet
  • Your computer
  • The internet and your computer ⇠ Answer

4. You know you're a troll if your hobbies include...

  • Lying to everyone
  • Playing with Decepticons
  • Deceiving people into doing sex stuff ⇠ Answer
  • Model-making

5. You know you're a troll if you live...

  • In a barn
  • In a tool shed
  • In a dark, dank room ⇠ Answer
  • In the middle of nowhere

6. You know you're a troll if you are...

  • Masturbating more than once in a day
  • Hacking into the person's accounts ⇠ Answer
  • Playing Dungeon and Dragons
  • Playing video games 24/7

7. You know you're a troll if you...

  • Go to school
  • Have a job
  • Have to steal someone else's money ⇠ Answer
  • Are rich

8. You know you're a troll if...

  • You're enjoying life
  • You're hating life
  • You're living it up
  • You have no life ⇠ Answer

Ironically, Chris, according to this quiz, is a troll with a score of 5/8. Apparently, black people can't be trolls, but stalkers, paparazzi, and sufferers of Celebrity Worship Syndrome are.

CWC Random Humor

Highlight for answers.

1. Walter Grisby threw a...

  • Tripple-e
  • Derby
  • Slurpee
  • Frisbee ⇠ Answer

2. Debbie Lubu had a...

  • bom-bom
  • tom-tom ⇠ Answer
  • com-com
  • bamm-bamm

3. The wife wants a night breakfast with her husband; she has an__; he the__

  • apple, banana
  • egg, milk ⇠ Answer
  • omelete, cheese
  • orange, grapefruit

4. Having one of these sitting on your head will make you into paper.

  • duck
  • hippopotamus ⇠ Answer
  • monkey
  • hedgehog

5. A baseball team has 18 of these, can't hold them, and are used at all games

  • baseball
  • glove
  • eyeball ⇠ Answer
  • bat

6. This is a mellow color.

  • blue
  • yellow ⇠ Answer
  • orange
  • green

7. This is a very fun and hot place (eso es un lado divertido y caliente).

  • La pacina con chicas bonitas
  • Abriendo un arbol de limon
  • La cocina en la case de casanova ⇠ Answer
  • Un hotel sin aire conditional

8. Carrots are good for for your eyes, can it dial a phone?

  • That's really stupid! ⇠ Answer
  • yes
  • no
  • I don't know.

CWC's Dating Education Exam

Highlight for answers.

1. About how many % of regular girls ditch boys, and how many % of pretty girl ditch boys?

  • 73/98 ⇠ Answer
  • 10/100
  • 50/50
  • 75/13

2. Which of the following characteristics attract your opposite gender best?

  • class clown
  • none of these ⇠ Answer
  • silent types
  • bragger

3. When is it appropriate to ask for a phone number?

  • do not buzz! (probably means no answer)
  • middle of conversation
  • end of conversation ⇠ Answer
  • upfront

4. Boys can be like magnets, and girls the metal, when the boy is confident, honest and smart.

  • true ⇠ Answer
  • false
  • do not buzz!
  • do not buzz!

5. If the relationship does not work out, you what?

  • worry
  • move on ⇠ Answer
  • none of these
  • cry and pout

6. How should you approach your opposite gender if you're really shy?

  • As a friend first ⇠ Answer
  • With hankey in mind
  • Pay money
  • Run away

7. Is she/he gives you a wrong number, try harder on that person.

  • true
  • false ⇠ Answer
  • do not buzz!
  • do not buzz!

8. To keep your girl/guy liking you, you should what?

  • Show off one skill
  • Keep clean
  • Act normal
  • All of these ⇠ Answer

Gilligan's Island Quiz

Highlight for answers.

1. Gilligan sang a song version of what famous question?

  • If I only had a brain
  • To be or not to be ⇠ Answer
  • Can a pig fly?
  • Blue bananas?

2. Why does a man climb a mountain?

  • TO get to the other side
  • Because it's there ⇠ Answer
  • On a whim
  • No reason

3. Who did Gilligan switch bodies with in the mind-swap episode?

  • Skipper
  • Professor
  • Mr. Howell ⇠ Answer
  • Ginger

4. Gilligan one-episode animal friend who he fed corn beef was what?

  • A pidgeon
  • A monkey
  • A turtle
  • A lion ⇠ Answer

5. The man who played Mr. Howell also voiced who?

  • Mr. Magoo ⇠ Answer
  • Underdogs
  • Bullwinkle
  • Danger Mouse

6. The Skipper was afraid of what so bad, he climbed out and ran into a tree?

  • A lion
  • A tiki statue curse ⇠ Answer
  • A sea monster
  • A typhoon

7. When Mr. Howell had a double, what did he realize could have confirmed him?

  • A birthmark
  • A tattoo
  • A mole
  • His signature ⇠ Answer

8. When Mary Anne had amnesia, who did she think she was?

  • Professor
  • Mrs. Howell
  • Gilligan
  • Ginger ⇠ Answer

Sonichu Quiz from CWC

Highlight for answers.

1. Sonichu was first though up on March 17 2000 for which computer-generated art piece?

  • website background
  • book series
  • CD cover ⇠ Answer
  • tradong card

2. Punchy Sonichu, who falls in love with a Flaaffy, is which type of Pokemon?

  • fighting/electric ⇠ Answer
  • electric
  • normal/electric
  • electric/psychic

3. Rosechu has a favorite thing, which is it?

  • zapbud ⇠ Answer
  • outfit
  • store
  • music album

4. Magi-chan's mentor while growing up was a parody to who?

  • Latios
  • Lugia
  • Mewtwo ⇠ Answer
  • Giratina

5. Bubbles entrusts the Sonichu crystal, which was found under the sea by a sleeping Blastoise, to who?

  • Angelica ⇠ Answer
  • Blake
  • Silvana
  • Lolisa

6. Sonichu rescues Rosechu from Robotnik's cell in which book?

  • 0
  • 8
  • 1 ⇠ Answer

7. Wild was raised by a Scyther and a Venusaur, which Pokemon did he learn conversion from to perfect his stealth nija skills?

  • Schyter
  • Smeargle
  • Porygon ⇠ Answer
  • Venusaur

8. CWCville University was the inspiration, and the first school, that taught which subject?

  • science
  • sex
  • math
  • dating ⇠ Answer

Highlight for answers.

  • El Pokesite de RWC
  • CWC's Bionicle site

2. Flame protected the sunstone which controls what?

  • Gloom's evolution to bellossom
  • Running speeds of Sonichus and Rosechus
  • The way things grow on earth ⇠ Answer

3. Simiar to the Powerpuff Girls, Blake was created with an accidental dose of what?

  • sugar, spice and everything nice
  • cherry cola ⇠ Answer

  • zapdos' DNA

4. Where is Metal Sonichu now?

  • Japan
  • Jupiter
  • The Moon ⇠ Answer

5. Which SOnichu has a princess for a sweetheart?

  • Punchy
  • Sonichu
